text: We use your IP address to help diagnose problems with our server, and to administer the Site.
We will share your personal information with third parties only in the ways that are described in this privacy policy.

For example, if you submit your email address and other information required to subscribe to our newsletter, we will use that Personal Information to send you our newsletter.
For instance, we may retain and use your Personal Data as necessary to comply with our legal obligations, resolve disputes, prevent fraud and abuse and fulfill and enforce our agreements.
Personal Information is used by the Company for the purpose for which it was submitted.
We may retain your Personal Data, which we collect via our company websites or third party sites and applications to fulfill the purposes outlined in this privacy policy for as long as needed, as allowed or as required by law.
We will share your personal information with third parties only in the ways that are described in this privacy policy.
